name: e-act Catcher for Akpala
description:
"e-act Catcher for Akpala" - A New Experience with Akpala Players


[Important] Notice:
"e-act Catcher for Akpala" is a special auxiliary software. It cannot be played standalone. Cooperation with players who own the VR game "Akpala" is required.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2341700/Akpala/

[Software Overview]:
This software invites "Akpala" players and captures their gameplay in VR in real-time. It is the perfect software for video recording and organizing e-sports events.

[Diversity of Uses]:
Not only for filming Akpala player's gameplay but also for hosting e-sports events and drama productions. Unleash your creativity to create new entertainment experiences.

[How to Use]:
Download and launch "e-act Catcher for Akpala".

  • Enter the matching lobby and generate a room ID.
  • Share the room ID with users who have "Akpala".
  • Once VR players enter the room, start filming or hosting e-sports tournaments, etc.

[Features and Functions]:

A PC version software that captures the VR experience of Akpala from a new angle.
Features include communication with players, camera switching, and camera operation during filming.
Allows filming of the game from a perspective different than the VR players of "Akpala".
With "e-act Catcher for Akpala", record the world of Akpala from a new viewpoint!
